Remote implementation of the AuthService interface.

Manages user authentication, including login, registration, session validation, and logout.

Represents a data block used for file storage and transfer.

CrypticEngine
Utility class providing cryptographic hash functions for data verification.
DAOFactory
Factory interface to provide Data Access Objects (DAOs) for different entities.
DBFileBlockDAO
Implementation of FileBlockDAO that interacts with a SQL database to perform CRUD operations on file blocks.
DBFileMetadataDAO
Implementation of FileMetadataDAO to manage file metadata in a SQL database.

Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for accessing and manipulating User records in the database.

Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing user data.

Manages file metadata and blocks, coordinating storage operations and persistence.
FileService
Remote interface for a file service using Java RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
